title: Screen View MCP
description: TypeScript project using Model Context Protocol (MCP) SDK that enables AI assistants to capture and analyze screenshots using Claude Vision API.
longDescription: Detailed description about the Screen View MCP project, covering its architecture, challenges faced, and solutions implemented. It leverages the Claude Vision API for image analysis within the Multi-Capability Platform (MCP) ecosystem.

title: Latent
description: Research project exploring latent space cross-attention mechanisms in transformers.
longDescription: In-depth exploration of latent space representations and cross-attention in transformer models. This research involved implementing custom PyTorch modules and experimenting with various datasets.

title: ConverseGPT
description: GPT-based chat app and infrastructure-as-code backend.
longDescription: A full-stack application featuring a React frontend and a Python backend powered by GPT. The infrastructure was defined using AWS CDK (IaC), ensuring scalability and reproducibility.
